TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PageEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event of a class that implements the interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> object raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> event when the control has obtained the total number of records of the underlying data source object. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control provides an event handler for this event named <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnTotalRowCountAvailable%2A>. This event handler initializes page-related properties and creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> objects that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> event is primarily used by control developers.
For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class.
> [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class.
|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.StartRowIndex%2A>|The value of the `startRowIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.MaximumRows%2A>|The value of the `maximumRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>|The value of the `totalRowCount` parameter.|
